result.execSummary:
The defendant Thomas J. Lorenz was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Fail/Report to County Jail (10 Days +), a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.425(1m)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Defendant is ordered to submit a DNA sample.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Thomas J. Lorenz

records.addlTxt:
11:08 AM Defendant Thomas J. Lorenz appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Luke K Harrison appeared by video for Thomas J. Lorenz.  Prosecuting attorney Anthony A. Lambrecht appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defendant waives his right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 2 for further proceedings.
ARRAIGNMENT
Information filed.  Not guilty plea(s).
Rights explained. Count 1, Failure to report to County Jail (10 Days +), No contest plea entered. Convicted. Parties comment. 
Court sentences defendant to twenty-one (21) days Manitowoc County Jail, under the Huber Law, consecutive to his current sentence.  Court imposes costs of $518 to be paid by 11-08-2022 or 11 days jail for failure to pay.  Defendant is ordered to submit a DNA sample.

4:17 pm - Defendant Thomas J. Lorenz appeared by video, in custody, at Manitowoc County Jail.  Attorney Luke K Harrison appeared by video for Thomas J. Lorenz.  Prosecuting attorney Anthony A. Lambrecht appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. The parties have a plea agreement in this matter.  Due to the lateness of the day, this matter will be reset so that both waiver of preliminary hearing and plea hearing may occur.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 8, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Preliminary hearing on September 8, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Preliminary hearing on September 7, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
Defendant in custody.   
Defendant demands a preliminary hearing.   Preliminary hearing is set for 09-07-22 at 3:00 p.m.   
Minutes.
RE:  Fail to report to jail, on 08-02-22.

BAIL HEARING - 
Defendant in custody and appearing by video from the Manitowoc County Jail.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crime of failure to report to jail.  The matters are continued for initial appearance on 08-29-22 at 1:30 p.m. Br. 2.  Bail is set at $2,000.00 recognizance bond.   Bail furnished and defendant is released from custody. 
Minutes.
